Congratulation ! Man, don't need to be nervous ,just relax to speech ,Come on .
We goal is  to build the Web 3.0ï¼ŒMany people in the world need more free speech. If the video can be publish by TED, which will let much more people know ZeroNet.

Many countries like China, people need ZeroNet work.  :)
I am Chinese ,I VERY love ZeroNet.
